entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High 12. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023
